translation: Commander, I'm glad you're here. \nWe have a situation.
Interdimensional signatures are popping up all over New York City.
As commander of S.T.R.I.K.E., interdimensional threats are your jurisdiction.
I've taken the liberty of assigning you two agents.
No one knows New York City like Spider-Man. He should come in handy.
I've also transferred my top medic to S.T.R.I.K.E. for additional support.
Looks like Kingpin is helping smuggle interdimensional <color=#fff568>ORBS</color> into the city.
We should start by intercepting his shipment.
Hey Commander! We intercepted Kingpin's guys transporting the interdimensional glowing things.
But Kingpin's mercs won't hand the orbs over. I even said "please!"
Use Spider-Man's <color=#fff568>BASIC ABILITY</color>.
Use the S.H.I.E.L.D. Medic's <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> to heal your squad.
Use Spider-Man's <color=#fff568>SPECIAL ABILITY</color> to defeat the remaining mercenaries.
Good work. Now bring those <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> back to base. \nWe can use them to open one of the orbs your team recovered.
Maybe if we use our remaining <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> we can open one of the <color=#fff568>ORBS</color>...
Select the <color=#fff568>PREMIUM ORB</color> to enter the <color=#fff568>ORB CHAMBER</color>.
Use the <color=#fff568>POWER CORES</color> to open the <color=#fff568>ORB</color> you recovered.
Luke Cage was inside that <color=#fff568>ORB</color>? \nHe does NOT look happy about that.
Sweet Christmas! \nThanks for getting me out of that thing.
Kingpin's abducting heroes around the city. He's using tech way out of his league.
Whatever Kingpin is up to, it needs to be stopped. Count me in.
Kingpin's our target. Your goals are tracked in <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVES</color>.
We've tracked Kingpin's operation to the warehouse district. Move out.
Complete <color=#fff568>MISSIONS</color> to make progress on your <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color>.
This is where you set up your <color=#fff568>S.T.R.I.K.E. SQUAD</color> for each mission.
You can <color=#fff568>PRESS</color> and <color=#fff568>HOLD</color> an <color=#fff568>ABILITY</color> icon to get details about that <color=#fff568>ABILITY</color>.
Applying a <color=#fff568>TAUNT</color> effect forces enemies to target that unit.
You recovered a <color=#fff568>TRAINING MODULE</color>. \nLet's send Spider-Man through <color=#fff568>TRAINING</color>.
To send a S.T.R.I.K.E. character through <color=#fff568>TRAINING</color>, select your <color=#fff568>ROSTER</color>...
Then select an <color=#fff568>AGENT</color> from the <color=#fff568>ROSTER</color>.
Choose <color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> to send Spider-Man through <color=#fff568>TRAINING</color>.
Select a <color=#fff568>TRAINING MODULE</color>.
Apply the <color=#fff568>TRAINING MODULE</color>.
Make sure to <color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force regularly.
We located Kingpin's warehouse. \nYour orders are to move in and engage.
The <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGN</color> continues in the <color=#fff568>HEROES ASSEMBLE CAMPAIGN</color>.
Completing another mission will fulfill your \n<color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color>.
<color=#fff568>SWITCH TARGETS</color> to focus your squad's attacks on <color=#fff568>ENEMY HEALERS</color>.
You completed a <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color>. Good work.
Congratulations on achieving Level 2!
Commander, I'm leaving you in charge of this matter. I'll check in with you later.
Continue the <color=#fff568>HEROES ASSEMBLE CAMPAIGN</color> to recruit <color=#fff568>THE PUNISHER</color>!
You're making good progress, Commander. \nYou just completed one of many <color=#fff568>ACHIEVEMENTS</color> for S.T.R.I.K.E.
Be sure to complete your <color=#fff568>ACHIEVEMENTS</color> and collect your rewards.
You almost have enough <color=#fff568>CHARACTER SHARDS</color> to unlock <color=#fff568>PUNISHER</color>.
Complete the next mission to obtain the final <color=#fff568>PUNISHER SHARD</color>!
Great job! Let's go unlock <color=#fff568>THE PUNISHER</color>!
New agents can be recruited from the <color=#fff568>ROSTER</color>.
Recruit <color=#fff568>THE PUNISHER</color> to your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force.
Take a moment to <color=#fff568>TRAIN THE PUNISHER</color> before adding him to your <color=#fff568>SQUAD</color>.
Fury said you needed a hand. Good thing I have two of those and a whole lot of guns.
This is where you can requisition <color=#fff568>SUPPLIES</color>, Commander.
We refresh our stock multiple times a day, so be sure to check back regularly for <color=#fff568>NEW SUPPLIES</color>.
As your <color=#fff568>COMMANDER LEVEL</color> increases, you will gain clearance for special, limited-time <color=#fff568>EVENT</color> missions.
Each of these <color=#fff568>EVENTS</color> offer unique benefits to either acquire powerful <color=#fff568>SUPPLIES</color> or new <color=#fff568>RECRUITS</color> for your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force.
Commander, you can now access <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>.

<color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color> test your skill as a Commander and reward you with <color=#fff568>TRAINING MODULES</color>, <color=#fff568>GEAR</color>, <color=#fff568>ABILITY MATERIALS</color>, and <color=#fff568>GOLD</color>.
As your <color=#fff568>COMMANDER LEVEL</color> increases, more difficult <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color> will appear with greater rewards.
Looks like Kingpin was also stealing <color=#fff568>S.T.R.I.K.E. GEAR</color>.
Let's put that <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> to good use. \n Spider-Man could use some new web shooters.
<color=#fff568>GEAR</color> empowers and upgrades your agents.
Increase the <color=#fff568>GEAR TIER</color> by completing a set of six <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> pieces and unlock new abilities.
The green icon means you have a piece of equippable <color=#fff568>GEAR</color>.
New web shooters! Being in S.T.R.I.K.E. has its perks!
Check back often to equip your characters with new <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> pieces.
Don't forget to claim your <color=#fff568>DAILY OBJECTIVE</color> for equipping <color=#fff568>GEAR</color>.
Commander of S.T.R.I.K.E., I am Loki of Asgard. Well... "an" Asgard.
I hail from a dimension where the Grandmaster reigns supreme.
As an envoy, I am scouting for new competitors in His Excellency's <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>.
In exchange for proving your strength against teams from other dimensions, you will be greatly <color=#fff568>REWARDED</color>!
Commander, we're taking the fight to Ultimus's forces. Let's launch a  <color=#fff568>BLITZ</color> to thin his ranks.
If we can defeat his troops, we'll rescue valuable allies and capture crucial supplies to aid in the war effort.
Send in a S.T.R.I.K.E. squad to knock out our corrupted foes, and I'll find you more targets. Let's keep the pressure on!
We are only one universe among a <color=#fff568>MULTIVERSE</color>, Commander. We aren't alone in the fight against Ultimus.
Here you can form <color=#fff568>ALLIANCES</color> and work together in accomplishing <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> against Ultimus's forces.
Create your own <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color>, join an existing alliance, or switch to a more powerful alliance. We leave it to you, Commander.
You have unlocked <color=#fff568>EVENTS</color>.
Here you will find <color=#fff568>SPECIAL EVENTS</color> with unique and valuable rewards.
Most <color=#fff568>EVENTS</color> only last for a <color=#fff568>LIMITED TIME</color>. Be sure to complete them before they expire.
Try completing the <color=#fff568>ELEKTRA EVENT</color> to obtain <color=#fff568>ELEKTRA</color>!
Commander, you have been making excellent progress. Are you aware we can simulate your past missions?
After completing a <color=#fff568>MISSION</color> with <color=#fff568>3 MEDALS</color>, you can <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> the battle instantly.
Tap <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> to collect <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> for your characters and earn more <color=#fff568>CHARACTER SHARDS</color>.
Give it a try, Commander.
You can <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> a mission up to ten times at once. Some missions can only <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> a limited number of times per day.
Commander, I'm giving you access to S.H.I.E.L.D.'s internal communication network.
You will now be able to <color=#fff568>CHAT</color> with other Commanders across the globe.
In order to grant you access, you will need to register a <color=#fff568>CODE NAME</color>.
What will your <color=#fff568>CODE NAME</color> be, Commander?
You can't win every engagement, Commander. Return to base and <color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> your recruits.
<color=#fff568>TRAIN</color> and equip <color=#fff568>GEAR</color> to prepare for the next mission. Take your time. Good luck, Commander
[TEMP] Welcome to alliance wars.
[TEMP] Battle it out with other alliances for unique rewards.
[TEMP] Destroy the enemy's Helicarrier rooms to win!
Commander, you have collected enough <color=#fff568>SHARDS</color> to promote a <color=#fff568>CHARACTER</color> to the next <color=#fff568>STAR RANK</color>.
Increase the <color=#fff568>STAR RANK</color> of a member of S.T.R.I.K.E. once you have collected enough <color=#fff568>SHARDS</color>.
Promote this character and increase their <color=#fff568>STAR RANK</color>.
Achieve <color=#fff568>STAR RANK 7</color> to unlock their full potential!
Complete <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGN</color> missions, acquire <color=#fff568>SUPPLIES</color>, or unlock <color=#fff568>ORBS</color> to collect more <color=#fff568>SHARDS</color>.
Commander, did you know you can <color=#fff568>AUTO WIN CHALLENGES</color> that you have completed with a <color=#fff568>3-MEDAL VICTORY</color>?
<color=#fff568>AUTO WIN</color> allows you to automatically complete a <color=#fff568>CHALLENGE</color> and receive the <color=#fff568>REWARDS</color> immediately. Give it a try.
Commander, we're receiving reports that Ultimus has strongholds all over the multiverse.
You will need to work together with your <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color> in an <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color> to clear them out.
To start an <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>, your <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color> will need to generate <color=#fff568>RAID KEYS</color>.
Each <color=#fff568>MEMBER</color> of your <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE</color> can generate <color=#fff568>RAID KEYS</color> by completing <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGN MISSIONS</color>.
Work together to unlock the next <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>.
Welcome to your first <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>, Commander.
Pick a <color=#fff568>PATH</color> to follow in order to clear out the enemies.
Each victory also holds a number of <color=#fff568>REWARDS</color> inside.
The more you contribute to the success of the <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color>, the better your <color=#fff568>REWARDS</color> when the <color=#fff568>ALLIANCE RAID</color> is finished.
You have a character with <color=#fff568>TRAIT SYNERGIES</color>. Tap the <color=#fff568>ICON</color> to see what they are.
The Kree are abducting my associates and converting them to their cause.
I'm sure whoever rescued would be willing to join S.T.R.I.K.E.
We're getting reports of Elektra running rampant in Hell's Kitchen.
Daredevil, work with the Commander on this.
I'll take a team and track her down.
Elektra, the senseless killing has to stop.
Murdock, you fool. It's not me.
Someone is committing crimes in this city while wearing my face.
I was closing in on the imposter when you jumped me.
That explains a lot. We have a common enemy.
If we help you with the imposter, will you help us stop the one she works for?
Gladly.
The impostor is headed this way... and it looks like she is not alone.
There are a lot of imposters floating around these days.
The likeness is uncanny. What sort of magic is this?
No magic. I am YOU. Just empowered by my newfound faith... and deadlier.
We'll see about that.
The imposter was NOT my equal in strength and skill.
Fury says these corrupted versions of us are weaker than the ones from our dimension.
So we work for Nick Fury now?
Working together is the only chance we have of defeating this threat.
Very well. But don't expect me to wear a badge.
Wasn't even going to suggest it.
The Elektra imposter was working to corrupt the Hand Ninja Clan to the invaders' side.
If they take control of the Hand, they will have an army of ninjas at their side.
Nobu is the Hand's leader. That's who they will try to replace.
Then we have to get to him before they do.
Our only chance is getting to Nobu before they replace him with a corrupted version.
Then follow me.
You enter my domain unannounced, ninja.
No time for formalities, Nobu. You are in danger. Imposters are attempting to--
If you are referring to our new friends, the Kree, then I believe you are too late.
They've already corrupted you. Then we do this the hard way.
Nobu has been corrupted. We have to take out the entire clan.
Better get to work.
The Immortal Iron Fist, you are sworn enemy to the Hand. Now you fight with them?
The Hand, the Fist, and the Devil fight for a new leader now.
Then you must be put down as well.
There is someone else guiding the Hand. Someone pulling Nobu's strings.
Our true enemy has yet to reveal himself.
I sensed that a corrupted version of myself might be behind this.
Deep down you know this feels right. You just always let your conscience get in the way.
You know I won't let you get away with this.
I already have. The New York Hand belongs to me now. And I answer to another.
I doubt that is the last we will see of your corrupted version.
Probably. And as long as a corrupted Daredevil rules the Hand, he runs New York City.
We have to find a way to regain control of the Hand.
I think I have an idea...
We're getting reports of a bank robbery in Midtown. Take a team and check it out.
A bank robbery? Really? While there's an interdimensional alien invasion going on?
Crossbones is involved. He was one of the first Hydra agents to work for the invaders.
It's important.
Aren't you supposed to be plotting world domination instead of robbing banks?
I don't work for our invaders anymore. They double-crossed me. All of Hydra, for that matter.
Their brainwashing commando squad should be showing up to kidnap me any minute now.
Here's the deal: I'll join S.T.R.I.K.E. and help you fight against them if you protect me from their commando squad.
Give me one good reason why I should trust a backstabbing Hydra mercenary like you?
Only one? For starters, I know a lot about your enemy's operation. Codes, procedures, transport sites...
And you know I pack a mean punch.
Let's get you some security clearance.
Okay, I joined your S.T.R.I.K.E. Force. Now you guys have to protect me from this brainwashing kidnap squad.
A deal is a deal.
Alright. You're safe. Now tell us everything you know about the invaders.
Give me a second... I gotta get used to the idea of being a good guy.
You are NOT a good guy. You're just the lesser of two evils.
Wow. You really know how to make a guy feel special.
The invaders' first step is to ally with evil organizations and get them to abduct heroes.
They trap the heroes in those orbs and send them through the portals for corruption.
Let me guess: Then they double-cross the bad guys and convert them, too.
Yeah. They left that part out of the initial sales pitch.
So now we're going to intercept a shipment of orbs as payback.
Now we just follow the trail back to the warehouse where they are sending these orbs through the portal.
You're actually enjoying this, aren't you?
Screwing over the guys who promised me the world and then tried to brainwash me?
Yeah. I'm enjoying this.
This is one of the black sites for Ultimus's kidnappers. Looks like they didn't relocate.
Perimeter breach! Alert!
Payback time.
Inside is usually where they keep the portal that they send the orbs through.
And on the other side is where they put them through the Conversion Process?
Yep. And what comes back is completely loyal to Ultimus.
Crossbones. They told me you had tried to run.
Thanks for saving me the trouble of having to pursue you.
That's me. Mister Helpful.
While I'm here, mind if we completely destroy your operation?
Damn, that felt good.
Korath is always running his mouth about "pursuing this" and "pursuing that."
Now the only thing he is pursuing is my fist!
That makes no sense.
Doesn't matter. Still felt good.
Only thing left to do is get in there and smash the portal.
Then Ultimus can't receive captured heroes in orbs and convert them.
Exactly.
Except for the dozens of other portals he's set up around the world.
Well, at least it's a start.
You really are a "glass half full" sort of girl.
You didn't really think you could just march in here and destroy our portal, did you?
Of course not. We planned on beating you up first.
Heads up, Latex. A corrupted version of Red Skull will be guarding the portal.
The Head of Hydra. Is that going to be a problem for you?
Not at all. I've thought of punching the REAL Red Skull in the face many times.
Beating up an Ultimus-controlled puppet version is close enough.
I'm starting to enjoy working with you.
Crossbones. You have betrayed Hydra and Ultimus for the last time.
Fine by me. Wasn't really planning on betraying you guys TWICE.
You shall pay for your betrayal.
You got it all wrong, Red Cheeks.
It's YOU who's going to pay. With my FIST!
You really have to work on your comebacks.
Smell that, Red? Sweet revenge. There's nothing like it.
Can you even smell through that mask?
Don't spoil the moment.
Agents of S.T.R.I.K.E., it looks like we have another problem brewing in New York.
New York. You mean "The City That Never Sleeps Because It's Always Under Attack?"
We're already following the trail of destruction. Thanos has arrived, but what does he want?
I believe he sees Ultimus as a rival and seeks to destroy him.
Thanos versus Ultimus? We should just let them fight it out.
It's true that Thanos is one of the few beings who rivals Ultimus in power. However, the collateral damage would be devastating.
We'll have to deploy a team to lure Thanos out of the city. Parker, do you copy?
Special Agent Peter Parker reporting from the scene, sir! I'll try to get his attention.
Deploy a team to slow down Thanos, or at least to lure him out of the city.
Hey Purple Reign, could I get you to take this thing outside?
And by outside, I mean, not on my home planet?
Be gone, insolent child. I will not yield until Ultimus lies broken before me.
Commander, I don't think he's interested in a team-up.
Ultimus! Stop hiding behind these pathetic mortals. Face me!
Mad Titan, I welcome the challenge.
Thanos, without your precious Infinity Stones, you are no match for me.
You need a lesson in humility. Perhaps if I exile you to another dimension you will come to know your true station in the grand order.
I think Thanos is waking up. Don't be mad, big guy, but I have some not-great news for you...
We've been captured by Ultimus, sent to another dimension, and trapped in a Kree Prison ship with Star-Lord and Gamora.
A temporary setback. If Ultimus thinks this paltry vessel can hold Thanos, he is sorely mistaken.
Gamora, does this egomaniac always refer to himself in the third person?
You do that, too. Constantly.
Once I free myself from this ship, I will locate the Reality Stone and use it to return to our dimension.
Thanos, we're trapped here together. For now, we're your only allies.
So it seems. Let us see how well you were trained in THIS dimension.
Excellent, we have taken control of the ship.
Yeah, but you damaged the primary flight controls!
Hold on, everyone! I'll try to make this landing a little less crashy!
Any landing you can walk away from, right? So, what's the next step to getting us back to our dimension, Captain Titanic?
The Infinity Stones. If I can find the Reality Stone in this dimension, I can use it to open a gateway.
I know the unique quantum wave signature of the stone. Find me a multiphasic tetraplex scanner.
Oh, that's all? A powerful scanner like that is incredibly rare. There's only one in this quadrant.
Sounds like we need a new ship.
I saw a starport in that direction before we crashed. Let's take out the guards and find a ship.
There's the starport. There's a suitable ship on the launch pad.
Spidey-Sense tingling. The guards have spotted us!
You ain't gettin' anywhere near that spaceship, Bub!
Ultimus wants your heads.
They've raised the alarm. We will crush their guards and see them driven before us.
...Wow.
Peter, can you create a diversion so we can get inside?
You know it! See you on the flipside. And Gamora... be careful.
Star-Lord drew off most of the patrols, but we'll still have to get past the perimeter guards.
Let them come. I will leave their broken bodies behind as a message to Ultimus.
You think you can take on ALL of us? Who do you think you are!?
I am Thanos, the Last Titan... And this day will be your last.
Your cruelty serves you well, as ever.
My cruelty forged your strength.
I was trained by the Thanos of this dimension, not by you. Ultimus vanquished him long ago.
Hey corrupted Yondu and corrupted... uh... me... Can we maybe just borrow your ship?
Boy, you got some stones on you. Ain't nobody getting on my ship without my say-so.
How about a showdown? You win, you get the ship. We win, we get Thanos in chains.
I can take you both alone.
That wouldn't be sporting, would it? Choose a partner.
Alright, kiddo, let's show 'em what we're made of.
You got it, pops.
Some tough guy you turned out to be.
Pitiful whelps. They never seem to learn.
Hey! I resemble that remark.
Sensors are detecting the multiphasic scanner on the world below. Energy readings are off the charts.
I need access to the central control capsule if I am to locate the Reality Stone.
I'll set us down out of range of their guns. I don't feel like crashing again.
Do as you must, fragile human.
This planet's defenses are pathetic. Ultimus shows no end of hubris.
The scanner isn't far from here. It will be more heavily guarded.
Loki, look at these fools. They think they can harbor a fugitive without retribution.
Well, at the very least, they ought to provide us with some degree of entertainment.
There was a time when it meant something to be a god.
At last, the central controls. Step aside, tin toy, or be crushed beneath my boot.
Don't think so, Thanos. I'm willing to sacrifice everything for Ultimus.
Stark, seriously, don't mess with this guy. He has a flying golden throne.
Yeah? So does M.O.D.O.K.
Ouch!
At last. We shall now return home and exact our revenge on the usurper.
Not one step further.
Nebula, you disappoint me in every dimension, it seems. You would serve that false idol and fight with these peons?
I learned the power of Ultimus when he destroyed the Thanos of this dimension.
And now I will see you defeated yet again... "Father."
So, I am forced to break you once more. Such a shame.
All that's left is to enter the control capsule and locate the Reality Stone. Then we return to the Nexus dimension.
I will focus the array while Thanos searches for the Reality Stone's signature.
The control capsule is online. I can already feel the energy coursing through me.
1 / 4 stages complete.
I'm reaching out, but I cannot feel the Reality Stone. More power!
2 / 4 stages complete.
The power... I can feel it... flowing through me... my strength, it... wait... NO...
Something is wrong. Let me try to regain control.
3 / 4 stages complete.
We've lost our Operator. We need to regroup.
AGH!!!  GRAAAH!!!
No! The system shut me out!
Uh... what just happened?
Thanos is mine.
Thanos, you have made this all too easy.
I knew you would be drawn to the promise of power.
It was the only way I could lure an Eternal like you into my Conversion Engine.
And in one stroke I have eliminated a threat and gained an invaluable weapon.
YES. I CAN FEEL THE POWER COURSING THROUGH ME. ALL HAIL ULTIMUS!
Looks like I found you just in time.
Doctor Strange! How did you find us?
I tracked your life essence across the Plains of Phlogiston.
Right. Well, whatever else you have up your sleeve, now's the time.
If you can hold off Thanos, I think I can open a portal back to our dimension.
By the Ruby Rings of Raggadorr...
1 / 4 stages complete.
By the Mystic Moons of Munnopor...
2 / 4 stages complete.
By the Hoary Hosts of Hoggoth...
Did he just say "Hoary?"
3 / 4 stages complete.
THERE IS NO ESCAPE. I WILL CRUSH YOU IN THE NAME OF ULTIMUS!
By the Fangs of Farallah, we do implore ye passage through...
YOU HAVE NOWHERE TO RUN. ACCEPT YOUR FATE AND SUBMIT.
Strange, let us come with you. Thanos cannot be saved.
Follow me and I'll deliver you to safety. Quickly, through the gateway!
Looks like this is good-bye for now, Purple Haze.
Just wanted you to know, even though it ultimately ended horribly for you...
With you getting corrupted and now controlled by Ultimus...
For the briefest of moments there, when we were fighting all those Ravagers...
I almost considered you...
A friend.
Psych! Just kidding! Later, you maniac!
Hello there, friend.
It's me! Your friendly neighborhood merc with a mouth... Deadpool.
Today you're in for a treat. I'm giving you exclusive access to a new game I made called...
Deadpool's MARVEL S.T.R.I.K.E. Force.
What does the S.T.R.I.K.E. stand for? I'm glad you asked.
Superhero... Tyrannosaurus... Ridonculous-- No, Retrograde... never mind. It's top secret.
Let's get to the story.
Once upon a time, a big blue alien named Ultimus invaded Earth and left a trail of destruction that laid waste to one man's most beloved eatery...
That place was Mauricio's Chimichanga Emporium.
That man was me.
I will have my revenge, and it will be EXTRA SPICY.
Hey, faceless minion! Bad news for you, buddy.
I came here to kick red-eyed butt and eat chimichangas, and I'm all out of chimichangas.
Is that Deadpool? I heard you were dead!
Only on the inside.
Sadly for YOU, I survived the blast that took the life of my most cherished chimichanga restaurant.
And let me tell you that nothing hurts more than boiling salsa deep inside a third degree burn.
Except maybe what I'm about to do to YOU.
Well, that was FUN. Tell me what you were doing here, or I'm gonna kill you even harder.
If you're looking for that mutant we captured, you're too late. He's probably being stuffed into an orb right now.
The plot thickens!
Looks like the merc convoy is about to leave, but they're setting up a bomb to cover their tracks. Not on my watch!
1 / 4 stages complete.
Pro-tip: Use my Special Attack and you'll be able to take out that naughty boy that's trying to arm the bomb.
2 / 4 stages complete.
Wait, are you on AUTO PLAY? Use my Special Ability!
3 / 4 stages complete.
Vengeance will be mine! I swear on Thor's bulging biceps!
You done good, boss. We took down all those mercs without even breaking a sweat.
I'm definitely bleeding, but no sweat.
Let's make like Quicksilver and follow that convoy.
Wasn't it great getting to beat the crap out of a bunch of bad guys using my Basic and Special Abilities?
Now you get to put on my big boy pants and use my Ultimate Attack.
We're gonna fight a bunch of goons on a classic New York rooftop, and then find out who they captured...
And Bullseye's gonna be waiting for me and he's gonna be angry for some reason. High drama, there.
Let's go rescue a hostage!
It is I, the one and only Deadpool. I am here to save the damsel in distress from the clutches of EVIL.
We've been waiting for you.
Bullseye said to kill you before you talk us to death.
I would respond with some pithy comment, but that would just be proving your point.
